Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.7 Cittasahabhūduka » 10.7.3 Paccayavāra » 10.7.3.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.7.3.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇa
Mahantaraduka
Cittasahabhūduka
Paccayavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇa
249.
2936Cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā…  tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisaṃ.)
2937Nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā…pe…  cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe…  kāyāyatanaṃ…pe… . (Imaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānadukaṃ paccayavāre ārammaṇasadisaṃ. Channampi imesaṃ pañcaviññāṇamūlā kātabbā. Saṃkhittaṃ.)
